description:
This market will resolve to "Heroic" if Heroic win against NRG in the named Counter-Strike match in the BLAST Bounty Qualifier, scheduled for January 14 at 8:30AM ET.

This market will resolve to "NRG" if NRG win against Heroic in the Counter-Strike match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://www.sofascore.com/esports.

markets.description:
In the upcoming match between Heroic and NRG in the BLAST Bounty Qualifier, scheduled for January 14 at 8:30am ET:

If Heroic defeats NRG by 6 or more rounds across all maps in this series, this market will resolve to "Heroic".

Otherwise, it will resolve to "NRG".

If the match is postponed, this market will remain open until the match has been completed.

If the match is canceled entirely with no make-up match, this market will resolve 50-50.

markets.description:
In the upcoming match between Heroic and NRG in the BLAST Bounty Qualifier, scheduled for January 14 at 8:30am ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if Heroic and NRG play 3 or more games in this series.

If fewer than 3 games are played, this market will resolve to "Under".

This market is based solely on the number of games played in the series, not which team wins.

If the series is postponed, this market will remain open until the series has been completed.

If the series is canceled entirely, with no make-up match, this market will resolve 50-50.

markets.description:
In the upcoming match between Heroic and NRG in the BLAST Bounty Qualifier, scheduled for January 14 at 8:30am ET:

This market is about the total number of rounds in this series.

This market will resolve to "Over" if the total number of rounds across all maps in this series is greater than or equal to 55.

Otherwise, it will resolve to "Under".

If the match is postponed, this market will remain open until the match has been completed.

If the match is canceled entirely with no make-up match, this market will resolve 50-50.

markets.description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between Heroic and NRG in the BLAST Bounty Qualifier, scheduled for January 14 at 8:30AM ET.

If Heroic defeats NRG by 6 or more rounds across all Matchs in this match, this market will resolve to "Heroic".

Otherwise, it will resolve to "NRG".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.
